name: Thoptaria
startIntroPart1: It's time for growth, for the mighty factory!
startIntroPart2: This Nation is prototype, kickass sammy boy!
declaringWar: We shall soar over your walls to deliver the future
attacked: Our innovation shall be your undoing
defeated: We came so far. And this is it. Our Reward.
introduction: We come on wings of man's collective knowledge. We wish to share our gifts.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: The Future comes for us all. This was always inevitable.
tradeRequest: We soar with the clouds, and bring gifts from far off lands.
